document_collection.name: Enter a short, meaningful name. Searchers will see this name as a facet.
document_collection.url_prefixes.prefix: Enter the folder where the files to be searched are stored. Don't add an index page.
site_domain.domain: Leave off www to include all subdomains. Use www for results from www.agency.gov only.
user.contact_name: Please enter first and last name.
user.email: Colleagues you add will receive an email to complete their registration.
i14y_drawer.handle: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscore characters only.
image_asset.favicon_url: Add your agency's favicon, the small image that displays in the browser's address bar for your website.
image_asset.logo_alt_text: If you leave this blank, we'll use the site name provided on the Settings page as the default alt text.
watcher.name: Enter a short, meaningful name.
watcher.throttle_period: Period of time in between successive alerts getting sent to you. (e.g., 30m, 8h, 2d, 1w)
watcher.check_interval: Period of time in between checks. (e.g., 30m, 8h, 2d, 1w)
watcher.time_window: How far back in time to consider. (e.g., 30m, 8h, 2d, 1w)
watcher.query_blocklist: Ignore alerts around these query terms (separate multiple terms with a comma)
watcher.distinct_user_total: Minimum number of likely human searches on a given term over the specified time window
watcher.search_click_total: Minimum number of likely human searches and clicks on a given term over the specified time window
watcher.low_ctr_threshold: Minimum CTR percentage on a given term over the specified time window (e.g., 15.5)
